<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>adding allow_tables=all to sys_archive_related table to enable cross application archiving</description>
        <name>Add allow_tables to  sys_archive_related</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_archive_related');
gr.addNullQuery('element');
gr.query();

var allowAllTable = 'allow_tables=all';
if (gr.next()) {
    var currentAttr = gr.getValue('attributes');
    if (JSUtil.nil(currentAttr)) {
        gr.setValue('attributes', allowAllTable);
    } else {
        gr.setValue('attributes', currentAttr + "," + allowAllTable);
    }
    gr.update();
}]]></script>
